This shaves off ~13s from this file, see #7103

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/45d3e5dd-4e42-42e6-9467-3c0bd7037f27) for commit 46d554abf8fdd609bf67e8487993467872d05bdb.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/85042cf7-bad7-4157-abf9-d8caf4a688bd/to/45d3e5dd-4e42-42e6-9467-3c0bd7037f27) against commit a856ab3b9d53c5837aa4f822be0992d36f781f2d:
```diff
  Benchmark                                  Metric         Change
  ================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.DirectSum.Finsupp   instructions   -77.3%
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - perf (DirectSum.Finsupp): mark `finsuppTensorFinsupp` noncomputable

source.title: Spikes in compilation + maximum resident set size
